review: Works great, like it better than my smart TV with Amazon already installed.
author: Roy French

review: I love making my boring flat screen into a smart tv. I also love Amazon! However, I find that this stick sometimes has a hard time staying connected to the network. Also, it does not do well when I try to go back to Netflix because it always makes me log back in again (could be a problem with Netflix, but either way my watch time is lessened). I still like it and use it often.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Great little device. I've had it for about a month now. The small device can't handle getting a little warm, because there is no way to turn it off without unplugging it. Once it is hot it gets very laggy and the video has a hard time keeping up. Unplug it, wait a few minutes, plug it back in and it work fine for awhile...
author: Nic Olson

review: Fifteen minutes after the FIRESTICK arrived I was watching some great programs.
author: emily himelstein

review: The fire TV stick works as advertised. It provides a cheaper alternative to steam apps on a TV. I used my Xbox360 to stream video, but lately has stopped working correctly. I chose the fire TV stick because of the reviews not only on Amazon, but all over the internet. Great price and performance.
author: Rob

review: I wanted to be able to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime on my television. This device allows me to do that. It also allows me to listen to my local NPR station which I have trouble picking up inside my house with a radio.
author: Wendy Ross

review: Some shows skip and pause too much!
author: richard maldonado

review: I have a Roku, Apple TV and a Seagate FreeAgent Theater+ HD so I'm familiar with this category of entertainment appliance.I only picked this up because I got it for $20 when it rolled out. After using it daily for several months, I believe even at full price, the Stick is an amazing deal vs the competition. I love the design...the remote...the interface...the ability to play games...plus, it works very well.For $39 the Stick is a truly great product for streaming. Paired with Prime, and you've got a great little entertainment combo.I use it so much that I almost wish I'd bought the beefier Fire TV over the Stick simply because I'm using some side-load apps (Kodi) and games that could benefit from a faster processor, etc. But, for 95% of what I want, the Stick is perfect.
author: Bryan Starmer
